name: Blungeon Slayer
author: Erik Nilsson
description: The Final Project for our Game Development class CSE 3902 at OSU. We worked in a team of 7 to create this Zelda remake over the course of the semester. The game is written in C# and is rendered by MonoGame. The goal of this project was to practice AGILE Development techniques. As of now the code is not available.
